name: Floaty Ball Alpha
description:
Gone to Greenlight

After months of development and dragging the game through many game events we have released a Greenlight campaign on Steam. The game has come a long way since this release. We'd love a vote

Enjoy our alpha release!

Super cute physics platformer.
Dive-bomb your enemies. 1-4 players

Auto AI if no input detected.

Xbox controller

A -> Jump/fly
B -> Dive
X -> Taunt
LS -> Move

Back -> Reset game

Keyboard controls:

Space -> Jump/fly
Left Alt -> Dive
Left Ctrl -> Taunt
Arrows ->Move

Esc -> Reset game

goodManLads is @Bluefood and @da_Moff developing Floaty Ball .

Follow us on twitter @goodManLads

Donate to help us make more mind blowing games.more often.
